summary.span: 提供 类的 HTTP 特定的实现。

span.span: Provides an HTTP-specific implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含对类的属性和方法的 HTTP 特定的使用的支持 。This class contains support for HTTP-specific uses of the properties and methods of the class. 类用于生成 http 独立客户端应用程序，这些应用程序可发送 http 请求和接收 http 响应。The class is used to build HTTP stand-alone client applications that send HTTP requests and receive HTTP responses. > [!NOTE] > 不要 将 在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用并且其方法和属性通过 ASP 公开的类混淆。NET 的内部 `Response` 对象。Do not confuse with the class that is used in ASP.NET applications and whose methods and properties are exposed through ASP.NET's intrinsic `Response` object. 切勿直接创建类的实例 。You should never directly create an instance of the class. 请改用通过调用返回的实例 。Instead, use the instance returned by a call to . 您必须调用 或 方法来关闭响应并释放连接以便重复使用。You must call either the or the method to close the response and release the connection for reuse. 不需要调用 和 ，但这样做不会导致错误。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 从 Internet 资源返回的公共标头信息作为类的属性公开。Common header information returned from the Internet resource is exposed as properties of the class. 有关完整列表，请参阅下表。See the following table for a complete list. 其他标头可以从属性读取 为名称/值对。Other headers can be read from the property as name/value pairs. 下表显示可通过类的属性获得的常见 HTTP 标头 。The following table shows the common HTTP headers that are available through properties of the class. |标头Header|属性Property| |------------|--------------| |Content-EncodingContent-Encoding|| |Content-LengthContent-Length|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |上次修改时间Last-Modified|| |服务器Server|| 来自 Internet 资源的响应的内容 通过调用方法返回为 。The contents of the response from the Internet resource are returned as a by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例从返回 。The following example returns an from an . [!code-cpp[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpWebResponse Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpWebResponse Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取响应的字符集。

span.span: Gets the character set of the response.

value.span: 一个字符串，包含响应的字符集。

span.span: A string that contains the character set of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个值，该值描述响应的字符集。The property contains a value that describes the character set of the response. 此字符集信息取自随响应返回的标头。This character set information is taken from the header returned with the response. ## Examples 下面的示例将获取响应的字符集。The following example obtains the character set of the response. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ContentEncoding_CharacterSet/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭响应流。

span.span: Closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关闭响应流并释放与资源的连接，以供其他请求重用。The method closes the response stream and releases the connection to the resource for reuse by other requests. 在调用方法之后，不应访问对象的任何属性 `Close` 。You should not access any properties of the object after the call to the `Close` method. 在 .NET Core 上， 将引发。On .NET Core, an is thrown. 您必须调用 或 方法来关闭流并释放连接以便重复使用。You must call either the or the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 不需要调用 和 ，但这样做不会导致错误。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 未能关闭流将导致应用程序无法连接。Failure to close the stream can cause your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何关闭 。The following example demonstrates how to close a . [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/CPP/httpwebresponse_close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/CS/httpwebresponse_close.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Close/VB/httpwebresponse_close.vb#1)]

exception.span: **仅限 .NET Core：** 已释放此 对象。

span.span: **.NET Core only:** This object has been disposed.

summary.span: 获取请求返回的内容的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the content returned by the request.

value.span: 由请求所返回的字节数。

value.span: 内容长度不包括标头信息。

span.span: Content length does not include header information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含随响应返回的内容长度标头的值。The property contains the value of the Content-Length header returned with the response. 如果响应中未设置 Content-length 标头， 则将设置为值-1。If the Content-Length header is not set in the response, is set to the value -1. ## Examples 下面的示例显示此属性的值。The following example displays the value of this property. summary.span: 获取或设置与此响应关联的 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookies that are associated with this response.
A that contains the cookies that are associated with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供 类的实例，该实例保存与此响应关联的 cookie。The property provides an instance of the class that holds the cookies associated with this response. 如果关联的的 属性 为 `null` ，则 属性也将为 `null` 。If the property of the associated is `null`, the property will also be `null`. 但服务器发送的任何 cookie 信息都将出现在 属性中。Any cookie information sent by the server will be available in the property, however. ## Examples 下面的示例将请求发送到 URL，并显示在响应中返回的 cookie。The following example sends a request to a URL and displays the cookies returned in the response. [!code-cpp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CPP/cookiessnippets.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/CS/cookiessnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLCookies#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCookies/VB/cookiessnippets.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing).

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

The contents of the specified header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 可检索特定标头的内容。Use to retrieve the contents of particular headers. 您必须指定要返回的标头。You must specify which header you want to return. ## Examples 此示例创建一个 Web 请求并查询响应。This example creates a Web request and queries for a response. 如果站点要求身份验证，则此示例将响应质询字符串。If the site requires authentication, this example will respond with a challenge string. 此字符串使用提取 。This string is extracted using . [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader/CPP/httpwebresponse_getresponseheader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader/CS/httpwebresponse_getresponseheader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseHeader/VB/httpwebresponse_getresponseheader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetResponseStream() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetResponseStream () As Stream

summary.span: 获取流，该流用于读取来自服务器的响应的体。

span.span: Gets the stream that is used to read the body of the response from the server.
A containing the body of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从请求的 Internet 资源返回数据流。The method returns the data stream from the requested Internet resource. > [!NOTE] > 您必须调用 或 方法来关闭流并释放连接以便重复使用。You must call either the or the method to close the stream and release the connection for reuse. 不需要调用 和 ，但这样做不会导致错误。It is not necessary to call both and , but doing so does not cause an error. 未能关闭流将导致应用程序无法连接。Failure to close the stream will cause your application to run out of connections. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](/dotnet/framework/network-programming/network-tracing). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 返回 用于从服务器读取响应的实例。The following example demonstrates how to use to return the instance used to read the response from the server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/CPP/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/CS/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_GetResponseStream/VB/httpwebresponse_getresponsestream.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是名称/值对的集合，其中包含与响应一起返回的 HTTP 标头值。The property is a collection of name/value pairs that contain the HTTP header values returned with the response. 从 Internet 资源返回的公共标头信息作为类的属性公开 。Common header information returned from the Internet resource is exposed as properties of the class. 下表列出了 API 作为属性公开的常用标头。The following table lists common headers that the API exposes as properties. |标头Header|属性Property| |------------|--------------| |Content-EncodingContent-Encoding|| |Content-LengthContent-Length|| |Content-TypeContent-Type|| |上次修改时间Last-Modified|| |服务器Server|| ## Examples 下面的示例将所有响应标头的内容写入控制台。The following example writes the contents of all of the response headers to the console. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Headers/CPP/httpwebresponse_headers.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Headers/CS/httpwebresponse_headers.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_Headers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_Headers/VB/httpwebresponse_headers.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastModified As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastModified { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取最后一次修改响应内容的日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the last date and time that the contents of the response were modified.

value.span: ，包含修改响应内容的日期和时间。

span.span: A that contains the date and time that the contents of the response were modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含接收到的最后修改的标头的值。The property contains the value of the Last-Modified header received with the response. 日期和时间假定为本地时间。The date and time are assumed to be local time. ## Examples 此示例将创建一个 响应查询，并对其进行查询。This example creates an and queries for a response. 然后，此示例将检查目前是否已修改请求的实体。This example then checks whether the entity requested had been modified any time today. remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回用于返回响应的方法。 returns the method that is used to return the response. 常见的 HTTP 方法是 GET、HEAD、POST、PUT 和 DELETE。Common HTTP methods are GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, and DELETE. ## Examples 下面的示例检查中包含的字符串 ，以确定 Web 服务器调用的 Http 方法。The following example checks the string contained in , to determine the Http method invoked by the Web server. summary.span: 获取响应请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI of the Internet resource that responded to the request.

value.span: 响应请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the Internet resource that responded to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含实际响应请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。The property contains the URI of the Internet resource that actually responded to the request. 如果原始服务器重定向请求，则此 URI 可能与最初请求的 URI 不同。This URI might not be the same as the originally requested URI, if the original server redirected the request. 属性将使用 content-type 标头（如果存在）。The property will use the Content-Location header if present. 需要访问最后一个重定向的应用程序 应使用 属性而不是 ，因为使用 属性可能会打开安全漏洞。Applications that need to access the last redirected should use the property rather than , since the use of property may open security vulnerabilities. ## Examples 此示例将创建一个 并查询， 然后检查服务器是否已重定向原始 URI。This example creates a and queries for an and then checks to see whether the original URI was redirected by the server. [!code-cpp[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/CPP/httpwebresponse_responseuri.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/CS/httpwebresponse_responseuri.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/HttpWebResponse_ResponseUri/VB/httpwebresponse_responseuri.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed
abstract member System.IDisposable.Dispose : unit -> unit override this.System.IDisposable.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 `Dispose` ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.
